participant_1.background:

My parents died when I was young, so my sister and I had to take care of each other.
i have traveled to europe and mexico.
I'm the son of lawyers and I can make fart noises with my armpits.
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.

my inspiration is clasical music.
i ve danced since i was two.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing great! Thanks for asking.
What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with my dog. What about you?
I'm working on a project for my students.
It's a lesson on classical music.
Oh that's really cool! I love classical music.
Me too! I'm a huge fan of Beethoven.
He's one of my favorites too! I also like Mozart and Chopin.
I love Chopin! He's so beautiful.
I know, right? He's my favorite composer.
I'm glad to meet someone who shares my love of classical music.
Me too! It's so rare to find someone who appreciates it as much as I do.
Maybe we can start a classical music club together.
That would be so much fun! I would love that.
Great! I'll start working on it right away.
Awesome! I can't wait to see what you come up with.
